name: Memories (itch) (Memories)
description:
"It began from a mysterious paper, Miko started his journey to remember all of his memory loss. Let's go to help him through exploration!"

Memories— a role playing game (RPG) where players are free to explore the map, while carrying out various objectives, from different quests. Complete the quest, to find out Miko's lost memory! Ps : Beware to all of the monsters, obstacle, and his mood.. 👀 !

Controls 🎮

Press W : For walk forward

Press A : For walk backward

Press S : For tilt to the right

Press D : For tilt to the left

Instagram : @_memoriesgame

Twitter : @playmemories_
